content: allow your personality to bloom in this gorgeous georgia o keeffe inspired flower top you re sure to sparkle in the sun this summer this piece is made from soft cotton with metallic thread in beautiful pastel hues you are welcome to sell the items you make with this pattern but please give me krazy kabbage a mention in your sales listing and provide a link to my website www krazykabbage com yarn bee sugarwheel cotton sparkle light weight 97% cotton 3% metallic polyester in twirls at twilight alternative yarn may be used you will need crochet hook size 7 4 5mm or size suitable for yarn used a yarn needle to weave in ends and a thick hair elastic choker necklace https //amzn to/44buw9d gauge 12 single_crochet x 17 row = 4 this pattern uses us terminology stitches and terms used single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain
